doc:
Louis Garrel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Louis_Garrel 0 Louis Garrel (born 14 June 1983) is a French actor and filmmaker. He is best known for his starring role in The Dreamers, directed by Bernardo Bertolucci. He regularly appears in films by French director Christophe Honoré, including Ma mère, Dans Paris, Les Chansons d'amour, La Belle Personne and Non ma fille, tu n'iras pas danser. Louis_Garrel ( born 14_June_1983 ) is a_French_actor_and_filmmaker . He is_best_known for his_starring_role in The_Dreamers , directed by Bernardo_Bertolucci . He regularly appears in films by French_director_Christophe_Honoré , including Ma_mère , Dans_Paris , Les_Chansons_d'amour , La_Belle_Personne and Non_ma_fille , tu_n'iras pas_danser .
